text: our team is actually responsible for all
of the data Cloud infrastructure and
digital workplace products and services
that we use inside of G Aerospace to
deliver business outcomes for both our
customers and ourselves prior to our
digital agile transformation we were
very much a waterfall based organization
so as you can imagine like our products
and our projects took a very long
drawn-out amount of time a big
contributor to that was Hardware
procurement and software procurement and
then roughly 10 years ago we decided to
undergo a large digital and agile
transformation and we knew to keep Pace
with both the industry as well as our
own internal transformation we needed a
new way of working and so that's when we
first started looking at the cloud and
more specifically at AWS as an
opportunity for us to move faster and
deliver value faster we chose AWS
because they're Best in Class since then
we've been partnering with them for the
most part of a decade and they've
continually innovated and constantly
worked with us to proactively identify
both wins for themselves as well as for
us we've done everything from our
engineering tools to our supply chain
analytics to our customer facing portals
we've migrated our entire on-premise
data Lake to the cloud specifically
backed by S 3 and then more specifically
leveraging redshift the the biggest
impact of the transformation and more
specifically our journey in the cloud
has really been the speed to markets
where we used to spend you know weeks
months quarters waiting for
infrastructure and middleware and now
we're basically able to go from idea to
implementation almost immediately
because of that we're able to drive a
lot more value both internally and
externally for our customers
[Music]
